oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show (Hicks Rubber Company)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Multiple recordings of the Hank Thompson radio show promoted by the Hicks Rubber Company. Original broadcast date is unknown. Backed by his Brazos Valley Boys of Johnny Manson on fiddle (persumably, not mentioned), Billy Gray on vocals (mentioned), Harold Lee "Curly" Chalker on steel guitar (mentioned) and Billy Stewart on bass and vocals (mentioned). The segment features Robert Charles as the announcer.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) You Were Only Teasing Me (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (01:38) Yesterday's Mail (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (03:47) Rose of the Alamo (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (05:36) California Women (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (07:16) Divorce Me C.O.D. (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (08:59) What Are We Gonna Do About the Moonlight (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (10:26) Brazos Valley Rancho [featuring Robert Charles voice over] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (10:50) I Wish I had Never Met Sunshine (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (12:49) Kentucky Waltz (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (14:43) Detour (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (17:15) Its Been so Long Darling (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (19:15) Charles announcement thanking the listeners -- (19:44) Swing Wide Your Gate of Love (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (22:28) Live and Learn (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (23:19) Charles closing announcements -- (23:35) Brazos Valley Rancho (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (24:24) Divorce Me C.O.D. (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (26:34) Swing Wide Your Gate of Love (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (29:17) Pins and Needles [featuring Eddy Hobbs vocals] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (31:13) You Only Want Me When You're Lonely (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys)
